defects.skip_reason: Due date completion silently succeeds — no feedback
defects.fix_approach: Add toast notification on completion

defects.skip_reason: Due dates lack content lifecycle types

defects.fix_approach: Add success/failure tracking; log duration

defects.skip_reason: Export onSnapshot has no error callback

defects.skip_reason: usePendingExports is a stub — always empty

defects.skip_reason: foundingDate uses plain string not ISO 8601

defects.skip_reason: All pages share same OG image

defects.skip_reason: SEO meta claims 100+ terms but only 30 exist

defects.description: validateSchema checks @context with string includes('schema.org') which would pass invalid contexts like 'not-schema.org' or 'myschema.org'
Schema validation for Article types does not check headline length - Google requires headline to be under 110 characters for rich results eligibility
Static FAQPage schema generated with empty mainEntity array which is invalid - Google requires at least one Question in mainEntity for FAQPage rich results

defects.skip_reason: schemaGenerator uses direct API key in production
